application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: DOCUMENTS AND DRAWINGS ARE NOT AVAILABLE ELECTRONICALLY FOR THIS APPLICATION. PLEASE CALL THE CASE OFFICER. Details required by conditions 3c (Submission of details-stone sample for paving), 3g (Submission of details-new windows) and 3h (Submission of details-new conservation rooflights) of listed building consent LB/24/05013 (Proposed internal alterations following approval of listed building consent LB/23/07421 to comprise: Lower Ground Floor: 1. Minor changes to internal door openings in LG.20 Shower Room. 2. Minor changes to internal door openings in LG.01 Gym. 3. Minor changes to internal door openings in LG.17 Storage. Ground Floor: No Changes. First Floor: 1. Minor changes to internal door opening into F.08 En-Suite 02. Second Floor: 1. Layout change in Guest Suite 3 and En-Suite 5. Third Floor: 1. Location of door opening changed in T.01 Staff Bedroom. 2. Minor changes to internal door openings into T.06 Powder Room. 3. Configuration of joinery and door openings into T.08 Storage. 4. Configuration of joinery and door openings into T.09 Storage).
